Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Balbo
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses temp. rerouted NB: Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, State and Madison; SB: Washington, Michigan, Roosevelt and Lake Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Balbo, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, State and Madison.

Southbound buses will operate via Washington, Michigan, Roosevelt and Lake Shore Drive.

Allow extra travel time.
